title: Upper Delaware Scenic & Recreational River: Public Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Public Transportation              Public Transportation      Public transportation will bring you into the area but there is no public transportation to sites within the river valley. BUS ShortLine Bus provides daily service from the New York City area to Port Jervis, Middletown, and Monticello NY.  Seasonal service is available to Honesdale, Milford, and Matamoras PA. COMMUTER TRAIN New Jersey Transit provides passenger train service from the New York Cit area to Port Jervis NY. PLANE Several airports serve this area: Wilkes-Barre/Scranton International Airport  (AVP) Avoca PA  Newark International Airport (EWR) Newark NJ  Stewart International Airport (SWF) Newburgh NY  Lehigh Valley International Airport (ABE) Allentown PA
